description: This file defines a Flutter UI screen for creating or editing a note within a notes application. It provides UI elements and logic for inputting note title and content, and interacts with a provider to save changes.

classes.name: EditNoteScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that provides a screen for creating a new note or editing an existing one.

classes.name: _EditNoteScreenState
classes.description: State class for EditNoteScreen managing text controllers and saving logic.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the state, populating text controllers if editing an existing note.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of text controllers to free resources.

methods.name: _save
methods.description: Handles validation and saves the note through the provider, then navigates back.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the editing screen, including app bar and text fields.
